channel.title: khanadee, Author at VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace. I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful …

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace.

I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful story that continued from beginning to end, with lots of unexpected IA and ONE lore sprinkled in.

It’s very clear how much 1st Place cares for IA, ONE and their fans. The concert was fantastic from a visual, story and musical standpoints. Several new songs were created for the concert and I would highly recommend checking out the soundtrack when possible.

Another highlight was certainly the live dancers. There were some very complicated moves they pulled off that made the crowd go absolutely wild. The choreography was amazing and the dancers were spot on. The costumes were just as good; in particular, I loved the complexity of the first one.

What a beautiful concert! Thank you for coming to the U.S.! @IA_ONE_Official @1st_PLACE0302 pic.twitter.com/DYT4qOlBza

— haneoka (@Haneokaa) November 4, 2019

(Some people got to take pictures with IA, depending on what ticket they purchased. What a beautiful outfit!)

Outside the concert was a booth full of IA and ONE merchandise. I may or may not have spent at least $80 there, but it was totally worth it. At the booth was also an AR poster, where you could take a picture of IA and ONE!

Thank you, Anime Weekend Atlanta!!

IA
ONE/O–òE
Staff#awacon #IA_ARIA pic.twitter.com/3Ppgtsrtzh

— IA&ONEÂÖ¨Âºè (@IA_ONE_Official) November 1, 2019

Please continue to support 1st Place and other companies, and request concerts like this or VOCAMERICA to come to a local convention near you! I look forward to seeing where ARIA and IA go next.

Sources

1st Place is on Twitter, as well as Facebook (and a global Facebook) and their own website.
Anime Weekend Atlanta has Twitter, Facebook and their own website.
Haneoka is on Twitter and DeviantArt.

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.

She will be available in both physical¬†and¬†digital editions. Her voice provider was also confirmed as Ëä±Á≠ùAnly. A list of her reduced and prices is below. Digital Version ‚Äì …

The post Quadimension‚Äôs HaiYi Releases Early appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Though her release date was scheduled for September 13th, Quadimension‘s latest vocal HaiYi was released early on the 6th!

Her voice library features¬†four pitches, including a falsetto! She will be available in both physical¬†and¬†digital editions. Her voice provider was also confirmed as Ëä±Á≠ùAnly. A list of her reduced and prices is below.

  • Digital Version ‚Äì Currently on sale for 500 RMB, You can get it for 408 RMB if you own all of the previous MEDIUM‚Åµ voice libraries. After the sale, she’ll cost 680 RMB.
  • Physical Version ‚Äì¬†Currently on sale for 515 RMB, You can get it for 423 RMB if you own all of the previous MEDIUM‚Åµ voice libraries. After the sale, she’ll cost 695 RMB.
  • Synthesizer V Editor ‚Äì Physical is currently priced 595 RMB, while the digital edition costs 580 RMB.

Please note her physical edition is only available for those that live in China!

You can purchase her here!

Sources

Quadimension is on¬†Youtube¬†and¬†Weibo
You can also find Stardust on¬†Weibo,¬†Twitter¬†and¬†Youtube
HaiYi, on the other hand, can be found on¬†Weibo!
Check Synthesizer V on its¬†official website¬†and¬†community forum
Kanru Hua on Twitter

The post Quadimension‚Äôs HaiYi Releases Early appeared first on VNN.

item.title: BIG AL’s 10th Anniversary Celebration is Underway!
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
Another Vocaloid is nearing their 10th anniversary! This time it’s PowerFX’s Big Al! Join in on his own dedicated event brought to you by celestrai: Big FestivAL! Lots of information as well as the schedule is already up! Event after event will be in the works leading up to Big Al’s 10th on December 22nd.¬† …

The post BIG AL’s 10th Anniversary Celebration is Underway! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Another Vocaloid is nearing their 10th anniversary! This time it’s PowerFX’s Big Al! Join in on his own dedicated event brought to you by celestrai: Big FestivAL!

Lots of information as well as the schedule is already up! Event after event will be in the works leading up to Big Al’s 10th on December 22nd.¬†

Here are the timelines for the events! They are subject to change but change is unlikely!

PLEASE TAKE NOTE! pic.twitter.com/thl3AyMu3i

— BIG FESTIV-AL @ FEST LAUNCH! (@vocafest) September 3, 2019

Big Al and his fans will enjoy things like:

  • An original song event and album of everyone’s efforts
  • A charm contest of an original Big Al design
  • A fanzine
  • And more!

Please note that aside from the charm contest, there is no physical or monetary reward for joining in. These events are for people to show their love for Big Al!

To keep up with everyone and make new Big Al loving friends, join the official Big FestivAL discord server!

Sources

PowerFX can be found on their own website!
Big FestivAL is on Twitter!
Celestrai is on Twitter!

The post BIG AL’s 10th Anniversary Celebration is Underway! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: DeepVocal Now Available For Open Beta
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
After over 1000 applicants for the closed beta, DeepVocal creator Boxstar has made his software available for open beta, along with a fancy new website that can be found here in English as well as Traditional and Simplified Chinese! Included on the website is the download page, Terms of Service, and End-User License Agreement, as …

The post DeepVocal Now Available For Open Beta appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After over 1000 applicants for the closed beta, DeepVocal creator Boxstar has made his software available for open beta, along with a fancy new website that can be found here in English as well as Traditional and Simplified Chinese!

Included on the website is the download page, Terms of Service, and End-User License Agreement, as well as the manual for voicebank creation.

A little important info about creating a DeepVocal character, as seen on the ToS page and told by developers:

  • You do not forfeit you character rights if you want to move your UTAU character to DeepVocal!
  • On the other hand, if you move your DeepVocal to UTAU, it requires new artwork but not a new design.
  • Do not redistribute or sell DeepVocal, the DeepVocalToolBox or DeepVocal voicebanks without Boxstar’s permission.

Sources

DeepVocal can be found here! Boxstar has a Twitter and a Weibo. You can also get in contact with him with his email at¬†boxstar@foxmail.com.
For additional information, help, and a community of DeepVocal users, join the Discord server here!

The post DeepVocal Now Available For Open Beta appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest!
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
Another VOCALOID has hit the double digits! VOCALOID 2 Sonika by Zero-G Ltd¬†is now 10 years old! To celebrate, VNN member celestrai organized Sonikafest! Since late May, over 60 people have shown their love for Sonika by participating in events including tuning events, a zine, creating original songs and much, much more. Both an official …

The post Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Another VOCALOID has hit the double digits! VOCALOID 2 Sonika by Zero-G Ltd¬†is now 10 years old! To celebrate, VNN member celestrai organized Sonikafest! Since late May, over 60 people have shown their love for Sonika by participating in events including tuning events, a zine, creating original songs and much, much more.

Both an official charm and – after a contest, a fan produced charm – were available for pre-order! This contest received 16 entries, of which nico (Pumpkin Head / galacticism) won.

The SONIKAFEST OFFICIAL CHARM has been revealed! Please stay tuned for information on how to order it and the Contest Winner charm in the limited preorder run! pic.twitter.com/81G8jQpa6F

— SONIK‚òÜFEST @ Tuning Event??? (@sonika_fest) May 26, 2019

The SONIKAFEST Charm Contest has been concluded! Out of 16 gorgeous entries, the winning entry is @galacticism_'s entry! Please stay tuned for information on how to order this charm and the upcoming SONIKAFEST Official charm in the limited preorder run! pic.twitter.com/ZjBOCNuuzw

— SONIK‚òÜFEST @ Tuning Event??? (@sonika_fest) May 26, 2019

A compilation album is free to download on Bandcamp with a donation option to support the organizer in future FESTs celebrating VOCALOID anniversaries.

Tracklist (ft. Sonika)

  • Lo-Fi Wannabe by Joshua Lie (Tuning: MeerkatQueen)
  • Stuck on Repeat by Pika-P
  • Lockjaw by Satinather (Tuning: dotkrawl)
  • Nightfall Parade by Nessa (Tuning: Pumpkin Head)
  • The Divinely Authorized Order of the Universe by Pumpkin Head
  • Living Hell by DEVILCAT
  • Kilter by OneThoughtRemains (Tuning: Pumpkin Head)
  • Still Standing by Kyttynz
  • Silence by MeerkatQueen
  • Landing by Quasar-P (Tuning: Pika-P)
  • Forget This, Forget You by MC Ballad
  • Wind In My Hair by Slightly Shredded
  • Stardust Message by celestrai

A zine is also available for free download with a donation option.¬†

Zine Contributors

  • Universally Skullie
  • CrisisNoi
  • hq
  • Taro
  • aureityGonoph
  • Synchro_Style
  • Crossy
  • tyler ray
  • MeerkatQueen
  • Purpled
  • Mixer-Endo
  • Teppichhai
  • Lone
  • Aia
  • Asami
  • DEVILCAT
  • celestrai

Please consider donating to both the album and zine!

The fun doesn’t stop today, either. Tomorrow (7/15/19), be on the lookout for the arranged version of the Zero-G Sonika Song Contest’s winning song U Know It by VioletCall, featuring seven people’s – myself included – different tuning styles!

Sources

Sonika was created by Zero-G Ltd.! They also have a Twitter and Facebook!
Sonikafest is on Twitter! Sonikafest is run by the marvelous celestrai!

The post Fans Celebrate Sonika’s 10th Anniversary with Sonikafest! appeared first on VNN.
